headline: NRG’s 18th Annual Impact Week Delivers 2 Million Meals Across North America
summary: HOUSTON, October 02, 2025--NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) marked its 18th annual positiveNRG Impact Week by mobilizing thousands of employees across 41 communities in the United States and Canada to fight food insecurity. From September 15–19, the NRG team came together to pack, sort, and prepare over 2 million meals for local nonprofits serving individuals and families in need.

headline: How a $562 Million Texas Loan for New Gas Capacity at NRG Energy (NRG) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In September 2025, NRG Energy secured a US$562 million low-interest loan from the Texas Energy Fund to support construction of a 721-megawatt gas-fired power plant near Baytown, with the project expected to begin generating power by summer 2028. This marks the largest loan approved under the Texas program, underlining state and investor confidence in NRG's ability to deliver increased grid reliability and meet Texas's rising electricity demand. We'll explore how this major financing...
